name: Hover Bovver (1983)
description: Hover Bovver is a 1983 maze game written by Jeff Minter released for the Commodore 64 and Atari 8-bit family. Like many of Minter's other games, it is notable for its offbeat sense of humour. The background music is based on the folk tune Country Gardens by Percy Grainger. It was arranged by James Lisney.
